view_type.row_bk_color: ListElem.is_dismiss ? AppUi.themeColors.list_disabled_bg : ( ListElem.web_banned ? AppUi.themeColors.list_light_bg : ( ListElem.current_state != '' ? AppUi.themeColors.list_semilight_bg : '' ) )

tile_item.name: ( ListElem.max_score > 0 ? ( Int( ( 100.0 * ListElem.score ) / ListElem.max_score ) + '%' ) : ( catCourse = ListElem.course_id.OptForeignElem, ( catCourse != undefined && catCourse.max_score > 0 ? Int( ( 100.0 * ListElem.score ) / catCourse.max_score ) + '%' : '' ) ) )

AppUi.themeColors.status_finished : ( ListElem.state_id == 4 ? AppUi.themeColors.status_cancel : ( AppUi.themeColors.status_archive ) ) ) )
